main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed over Dayton, Ohio on September 5, 1964.
interesting points: The object exhibited fast and slow periods of motion.
The object's brightness changed during the observation.
The object was observed for 6-7 minutes before being lost from sight.
The sighting was carried as an ECHO observation by Project Blue Book.
The object was observed by a civilian witness in Dayton, Ohio.
